segments.text: I received an eviction notice from you , and I don ’ t understand what it means .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you are behind in your rent ; it ’ s a 30 - day notice to vacate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can ’ t make me move just for being late with my rent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have been late with your rent several times now . I am filing suit for back rent to protect myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This notice is to let you know that you will be evicted by a sheriff if you don ’ t make good on your rent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I catch up on my rent , can I stay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can stay if you catch up and stay caught up . Otherwise , I will find another renter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will go get the money right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Please make sure that you pay with cash or a cashier ’ s check .
segments.speaker: S2
